tftp-server.doc: A node that has a TFTP protocol server.

pxe-server.doc: A node with a TFTP server that can serve PXE boot files (menus, images, tools)

nginx-server.doc: A node with an NGINX web server

apache-server.doc: A node with an Apache web server

http-server.doc: A node with an http web server (regardless of Apache or Nginx)

nginx-repo.doc: A node with an NGINX web server serving general purpose files for infrastructure support

dhcp-server.doc: A node with an DHCP server

dns-server.doc: A node with an DNS server

ntp-server.doc: A node with an NTP server (ntpd or Chrony)

graphite.doc: A node with an Graphite metrics service

grafana.doc: A node with a Grafana service

carbon-relay.doc: A node with an Carbon-Relay-NG service
